quests.name: A Honey of a Problem
objectives: Go inside Tigger's House.
Agh! Tigger's House is full of bees! Talk to Tigger about it.

Remove the Fallen Beehive debris in the Hundred-Acre Fields using a horse.
  ‧ Look for the 3 giant pink flowers in Hundred-Acre Fields.

Gather items to craft new Giant Beehives and Bee-Soothing Furniture:
  ‧ Mine for 10 Honeycomb Stone.
  ‧ Mine for 4 Grassy Ore.
  ‧ Dig for 12 Giant Acorns.
  ‧ Fish for 6 Honey Coral.
  ‧ Mine for 12 Hardwood.
  ‧ Dig for 14 Clay.
  ‧ Gather 4 Blue Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ Gather 2 Purple Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ Gather 3 Yellow Lily of the Valley.

Craft new homes and furniture for the bees:
  ‧ 3 Giant Beehive.
  ‧ 2 Honeycomb Picnic Table.
  ‧ 1 Fairy Harp.
Replace the Giant Beehives on the Giant Pink Flowers in the Hundred-Acre Fields:

Place bee-soothing furniture in the Hundred-Acre Fields:
  ‧ 2 Honeycomb Picnic Table.
  ‧ 1 Fairy Harp.
Go back to Tigger's House.
The bees are still running wild! Talk to Tigger.

Tigger's House is still full of swarming bees!
  ‧ Ask Snow White for advice.

Gather Ingredients for the Honey Perfume and Royal Bee Crown:
  ‧ Fish for 3 Goose Feathers.
  ‧ Fish for 2 Honey Coral.
  ‧ Mine for 2 Pyrite.
  ‧ Gather 1 Red Silk Flower.
  ‧ Gather 1 Fairy Sprinkles.

It's time to become a queen bee:
  ‧ Craft a Regal Bee Crown.

It's time to become a queen bee:
  ‧ Prepare some Honey Perfume at a Cooking Station.

It's time to become a queen bee:
  ‧ Dress up like queen bee using:
  ‧ ‧ 1 Royal Bee Crown.
  ‧ ‧ 2 Black clothes.
  ‧ ‧ 2 Yellow clothes.
  ‧ Activate the Honey Perfume from your Inventory.
  ‧ (Optional) Order the clothes you need from Scrooge McDuck.
Go back to Tigger's House to lure out the bees.
Huh? The bees are gone! Talk to Tigger.

Catch the Swarms of Bees around Sundae Shores:
  ‧ (Optional) Use a Horse to chase the bees.
  ‧ ‧ On the small beach.
  ‧ ‧ Near the waterfall.
  ‧ ‧ Near the Modish Marsh passage.
Return the bees to each Giant Beehive in the Hundred-Acre Fields
Return to Tigger.

quests.name: Terribly Twitchy Tigger
objectives:
Tigger's gotten Tinker Bell awfully mad.
  ‧ Follow Tigger to find out why.

Tigger's gotten Tinker Bell awfully mad.
  ‧ Follow Tigger some more.

Tigger's gotten Tinker Bell awfully mad.
  ‧ Follow Tigger to the pond in Pixie Flats.
Remove the 6 Huge Trash Piles in Pixie Flats using your horse.

Recreate Tinker Bell's garden in Pixie Flats:
  ‧ Plant new crops:
  ‧ ‧ 5 Pearly Barley Seeds.
  ‧ ‧ 5 Dark Chocolate Coffee Bean Seeds.
  ‧ ‧ 5 Lollipop Fruit Seeds.
  ‧ ‧ 5 Fairy Kamut Seeds.
  ‧ Add any fences around the garden

The garden is restored!
  ‧ Talk to Tinker Bell near the pond in Pixie Flats.

Tigger and Stitch have also angered Cruella...
  ‧ Follow Tigger to the Modish Marsh.
Remove the 6 Huge Trash Piles in the Modish Marsh using your horse.

Gather everything you need to craft Gothic Furniture.
  ‧ 16 Antique Clothes Iron.
  ‧ 10 Beady Soil.
  ‧ 6 Sequin Strands.
  ‧ 5 Red Silk Flower.
  ‧ 2 Jasper.
  ‧ 2 Glass.

Craft the following furniture for Cruella:
  ‧ 2 Gothic Patio Chairs.
  ‧ 2 Gothic Bench.
  ‧ 1 Gothic Patio Table.
  ‧ 1 Cast Iron Greyhound Sculpture.

Decorate the Modish Marsh in Glamour Gulch with the furniture:
  ‧ 2 Gothic Patio Chairs.
  ‧ 2 Gothic Bench.
  ‧ 1 Gothic Patio Table.
  ‧ 1 Cast Iron Greyhound Sculpture.

The Gothic patio is restored...
  ‧ Return to Cruella.

Did Tigger and Stitch also anger Snow White?
  ‧ Talk to her.

Gather Ingredients for the Fairy Bread.
  ‧ 3 Fairy Kamut.
  ‧ 3 Fairy Sprinkles.
Freshly cook some Fairy Bread to calm Tigger and Stitch
Make sure you have the Fairy Bread in your Inventory.
Go to Snow White's House.
Give the Fairy Bread to Snow White.

quests.name: Woozle Bamboozle
objectives: Go inside Tigger's House to investigate.

Investigate the missing items in Tigger's House.
  ‧ Interact with each spot to learn more.
Talk to Tigger.
Take a picture of the Woozle Footprints in Tigger's home.
Ask Tinker Bell about the Footprints.
Go to the Wishblossom Heart.
Talk to Tigger.

Search for Tigger's stuff in the Wishblossom Heart.
  ‧ (Follow the trail of Woozle tracks and use Khan to break obstacles.)
You've found Tigger's Toy Barrel!
Show it to Tigger.

Find the other lost items in the Heart by following more Woozle tracks.
  ‧ (Use Khan to remove all obstacles.)
  ‧ ‧ "Pin the Tail on Maximus" Tails.
  ‧ ‧ Tigger's Basketball Net.
  ‧ ‧ Tigger's Bouncy Stool.
Return to Tigger.

Place each item where they belong in Tigger's home
  ‧ Tigger's Basketball Net
  ‧ "Pin the Tail on Maximus" Tail
  ‧ Tigger's Bouncy Stool
  ‧ Tigger's Toy Barrel
Return to Tigger.

quests.name: A Tiggerific Day
objectives: Talk to Snow White for advice about how to handle a lonely Tigger.

Freshly cook some Tigger-themed dishes:
  ‧ Tigger Tails.
  ‧ Bread Bowl Pumpkin Soup.
  ‧ Friendly Bento.

Make sure you have the Tigger-themed foods in your Inventory.
  ‧ Tigger Tails.
  ‧ Bread Bowl Pumpkin Soup.
  ‧ Friendly Bento.
Bring Tigger the Tigger-themed foods.

Dress up like Tigger using:
  ‧ 1 Tigger Tail.
  ‧ 3 Orange clothes.
  ‧ 2 Black clothes.
(Optional) Order the exact clothes you need from Scrooge McDuck.
Talk to Tigger to see what he thinks of your tiggerific outfit.

Gather materials for the Tiggerific Horse Blanket:
  ‧ 3 Goose Feathers.
  ‧ 1 Black Silk Flower.
  ‧ 1 Red Silk Flower.
  ‧ 1 Yellow Lily of the Valley.
Craft the Tiggerific Horse Blanket.
Equip your Wishblossom Horse with the Tiggerific Horse Blanket.
Ride your tiggerific Wishblossom Horse before meeting with Tigger.
Talk to Tigger while riding on your Wishblossom Horse.
(Optional) Create your own obstacle course in Wishblossom Mountains using any fences.
Jump over 20 obstacles along with Tigger.
Return to Tigger.

Prepare a surprise for Tigger!
  ‧ Meet Snow White in her House.
  ‧ Talk to Snow White.

Gather materials to make the Tiggerific Poster Billboard:
  ‧ 10 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
  ‧ 3 Antique Clothes Iron.
  ‧ 1 Black Silk Flower.
  ‧ 1 Red Silk Flower.
  ‧ 1 Yellow Lily of the Valley.
Craft the Tiggerific Poster Billboard to commemorate this day.
Place down the Tiggerific Poster Billboard in Wishblossom Mountains.
Take a picture to capture the tiggerific moment!
Return to Tigger.
